context_bundle.summary: State synchronization for multi-agent systems. File-based state in PhiVector. Eventual consistency (high performance) vs strong consistency (correctness). CRDTs for automatic conflict resolution. Vector clocks track causality. Locking prevents concurrent modification.

onboarding.quick_start: State sync = keep agents consistent. Eventual: Temporary divergence OK, high performance. Strong: All see same state, lower performance. CRDTs: Conflict-free merges. Vector clocks: Detect causality conflicts. File-based: Atomic writes, lock files.
common_patterns: Strong consistency: File locking, serialize access
Vector clocks: {DC:5, VSCC:3} tracks agent versions

known_errors.error: State conflict, agents see different data
known_errors.solution: Implement locking or use CRDTs for automatic resolution
known_errors.prevention: Design for eventual consistency or serialize critical updates
